name: patriotic hat
notes:
knit a cozy patriotic hat to show your support for kamala harris and tim walz! perfect for the women's march on november 2, 2024 - this hat is not only stylish but also a wonderful way to express your values.

**this pattern has an accompanying video on youtube:** https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jyleo0f3-io

**youtube channel:** https://www.youtube.com/@joymacdonell?sub_confirmation=1

**we also have zoom craft-along meetings you can join:**

[september 19th][3]
[september 23rd][4]
[october 6th][5]
[october 19th][6]
[october 29th][7]

please join the hats for harris group here on ravelry: https://www.ravelry.com/groups/hats-for-harris

if you are looking for recommendations for yarn substitutions for the icewear wool, here are some good choices:

[cascade 220][8]
[berroco vintage dk][9]
[sandnes garn double sunday][10]

you will need about 90 - 100 yards of each color
